content: Which classic novel by Jane Austen tells the story of Elizabeth Bennet and her four sisters as they navigate love and societal expectations?

The classic novel you're referring to is "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen. Published in 1813, it follows the lives of the Bennet sisters, with particular focus on Elizabeth Bennet, as they deal with issues of manners, upbringing, morality, education, and marriage in the society of the landed gentry of early 19th-century England.
